featured.text: Kim was completely ______ after jogging in the hot sun all afternoon; she had little energy left.

definition.zh_def: 金屬或合金的名稱，通常指鋼或鐵的合金，常用於製造工具和機械部件。
definition.en_def: A type of metal or alloy, often referring to steel or iron alloys, commonly used for making tools and mechanical parts.
definition.example: The mechanic used a kim to repair the engine.
